replies.body:
:O The bump is real xD

@MonsieurStar
1. At the moment Im living moderating! It makes me feel like I am making a big(er) difference to the server!
2. Definitely Walls, Walls is my favourite game-mode on avicus. I just enjoy the whole concept of gaining gear and then duking it out in combat!

@MarksColtFan
1. I would run away and question life.

@Connor4961
1. The community here is just so welcoming and great, I don't see how anyone could resist. Also the teamspeak is so great <3 I have made so many great friends off of it!
2. I play cricket and a bit of basketball.
3. Nope, not even.
4. Dying before my parents.
5. Edwin Starr ("War" is too good)
6. Hmmm, I wouldn't say I have a favourite.
7. I would like to be haunted by Casper, I would just befriend him.
8. The Letter For The King by: Tonke Dragt (originally in German)

@ScriptingCookies
1. Chocolate Chip!
2. Cricket and Basketball
3. Muffin
4. Coke
5. Soda
6. Village

replies.body:
1. Who is your hero?
  2. If you could live anywhere, where would it be?
  3. What is your biggest fear?
  4. What is your favorite family vacation?
  5. What would you change about yourself if you could?
  6. What really makes you angry?
  7. What motivates you to work hard?
  8. What is your favorite thing about your career?
  9. What is your biggest complaint about your job?
  10. What is your proudest accomplishment?
  11. What is your child's proudest accomplishment?
  12. What is your favorite book to read?
  13. What makes you laugh the most?
  14. What was the last movie you went to? What did you think?
  15. What did you want to be when you were small?
  16. What does your child want to be when he/she grows up?
  17. If you could choose to do anything for a day, what would it be?
  18. What is your favorite game or sport to watch and play?
  19. Would you rather ride a bike, ride a horse, or drive a car?
  20. What would you sing at Karaoke night?
  21. What two radio stations do you listen to in the car the most?
  22. Which would you rather do: wash dishes, mow the lawn, clean the bathroom, or vacuum the house?
  23. If you could hire someone to help you, would it be with cleaning, cooking, or yard work?
  24. If you could only eat one meal for the rest of your life, what would it be?
  25. Who is your favourite author?

   26. Have you ever had a nickname? What is it?
   27. Do you like or dislike surprises? Why or why not?
   28. In the evening, would you rather play a game, visit a relative, watch a movie, or read?
   29. Would you rather vacation in Hawaii or Alaska, and why?
   30. Would you rather win the lottery or work at the perfect job? And why?
   31. Who would you want to be stranded with on a deserted island?
   32. If money was no object, what would you do all day?
   33. If you could go back in time, what year would you travel to?
   34. How would your friends describe you?
   35. What are your hobbies?
   36. What is the best gift you have been given?
   37. What is the worst gift you have received?
   38. Aside from necessities, what one thing could you not go a day without?
   39. List two pet peeves.
   40. Where do you see yourself in five years?
   41. How many pairs of shoes do you own?
   42. If you were a super-hero, what powers would you have?
   43. What would you do if you won the lottery?
   44. What form of public transportation do you prefer? (air, boat, train, bus, car, etc.)
   45. What's your favorite zoo animal?
   46. If you could go back in time to change one thing, what would it be?
   47. If you could share a meal with any 4 individuals, living or dead, who would they be?
   48. How many pillows do you sleep with?
   49. What's the longest you've gone without sleep (and why)?
   50. What's the tallest building you've been to the top in?

   51. Would you rather trade intelligence for looks or looks for intelligence?
   52. How often do you buy clothes?
   53. Have you ever had a secret admirer?
   54. What's your favorite holiday?
   55. What's the most daring thing you've ever done?
   56. What was the last thing you recorded on TV?
   57. What was the last book you read?
   58. What's your favorite type of foreign food?
   59. Are you a clean or messy person?
   60. Who would you want to play you in a movie of your life?
   61. How long does it take you to get ready in the morning?
   62. What kitchen appliance do you use every day?
   63. What's your favorite fast food chain?
   64. What's your favorite family recipe?
   65. Do you love or hate rollercoasters?
   66. What's your favorite family tradition?
   67. What is your favorite childhood memory?
   68. What's your favorite movie?
   69. How old were you when you learned Santa wasn't real? How did you find out?
   70. Is your glass half full or half empty?
   71. What's the craziest thing you’ve done in the name of love?
   72. What three items would you take with you on a deserted island?
   73. What was your favorite subject in school?
   74. What's the most unusual thing you've ever eaten?
   75. Do you collect anything?

   76. Is there anything you wished would come back into fashion?
   77. Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
   78. Which of the five senses would you say is your strongest?
   79. Have you ever had a surprise party? (that was an actual surprise)
   80. Are you related or distantly related to anyone famous?
   81. What do you do to keep fit?
   82. Does your family have a “motto” – spoken or unspoken?
   83. If you were ruler of your own country what would be the first law you would introduce?
   84. Who was your favorite teacher in school and why?
   85. What three things do you think of the most each day?
   86. If you had a warning label, what would yours say?
   87. What song would you say best sums you up?
   88. What celebrity would you like to meet at Starbucks for a cup of coffee?
   89. Who was your first crush?

   90. What's the most interesting thing you can see out of your office or kitchen window?
   91. On a scale of 1-10 how funny would you say you are?
   92. Where do you see yourself in 10 years?
   93. What was your first job?
   94. If you could join any past or current music group which would you want to join?
   95. How many languages do you speak?
   96. What is your favourite family holiday tradition?
   97. Who is the most intelligent person you know?
   98. If you had to describe yourself as an animal, which one would it be?
   99. What is one thing you will never do again?
 100. Who knows you the best?

replies.body:
1. Who is your hero? I dont really have a hero. I look up to my dad quite a bit though.
  2. If you could live anywhere, where would it be? I would love to live in Trinidad.
  3. What is your biggest fear? I am incredibly paranoid. I hate going out to places where I am not completely aware of my surroundings.
  4. What is your favorite family vacation? I enjoy going to NYC. I go there every summer.
  5. What would you change about yourself if you could? I would have never played Minecraft.
  6. What really makes you angry? Thats my secret, I'm always Angry and Sleepy.
  7. What motivates you to work hard? I only care about grades.
  8. What is your favorite thing about your career? No career
  9. What is your biggest complaint about your job? No Job
  10. What is your proudest accomplishment? Being a survivor.
  11. What is your child's proudest accomplishment? I have no children.
  12. What is your favorite book to read? I love reading LOTR
  13. What makes you laugh the most? My friends
  14. What was the last movie you went to? What did you think? The Martian, I loved the movie. It was actually science oriented, not random quick false science.
  15. What did you want to be when you were small? A baker
  16. What does your child want to be when he/she grows up? No child
  17. If you could choose to do anything for a day, what would it be? An architect
  18. What is your favorite game or sport to watch and play? Cricket
  19. Would you rather ride a bike, ride a horse, or drive a car? Drive a car
  20. What would you sing at Karaoke night? No
  21. What two radio stations do you listen to in the car the most? Virgin Radio (UAE) Dubai92
  22. Which would you rather do: wash dishes, mow the lawn, clean the bathroom, or vacuum the house? Mow the lawn
  23. If you could hire someone to help you, would it be with cleaning, cooking, or yard work? Cleaning
  24. If you could only eat one meal for the rest of your life, what would it be? Cake (Not a meal but still!)
  25. Who is your favourite author? Not really sure.

   26. Have you ever had a nickname? What is it? Tim something.... Much embarrassed
   27. Do you like or dislike surprises? Why or why not?  I HATE SURPRISES. They are fucking annoying, ruin plans.
   28. In the evening, would you rather play a game, visit a relative, watch a movie, or read? Play a game/read.
   29. Would you rather vacation in Hawaii or Alaska, and why? Hawaii, tropical weather op!
   30. Would you rather win the lottery or work at the perfect job? And why? Perfect job, I would be happy and be gaining money from doing something I love.
   31. Who would you want to be stranded with on a deserted island? No not even, why would anyone be stranded on anything.
   32. If money was no object, what would you do all day? Uhhh I dont know.
   33. If you could go back in time, what year would you travel to? 1945.
   34. How would your friends describe you? Funny and really weird. Smart ass sometimes....
   35. What are your hobbies? Hmmm..
   36. What is the best gift you have been given? Life.
   37. What is the worst gift you have received? A hug.
   38. Aside from necessities, what one thing could you not go a day without? A pencil. LOL
   48. How many pillows do you sleep with? 4
   49. What's the longest you've gone without sleep (and why)? All nighter-48 hours.
   50. What's the tallest building you've been to the top in?-Burj Khalifa LOL get REKT

   51. Would you rather trade intelligence for looks or looks for intelligence? Looks for intelligence
   52. How often do you buy clothes? Every other month.
   53. Have you ever had a secret admirer? I dont think so.
   54. What's your favorite holiday? Eid.
   55. What's the most daring thing you've ever done? Hmmmmm, parkour!!>1211?
   56. What was the last thing you recorded on TV? I dont record on TV
   57. What was the last book you read? The Martian
   58. What's your favorite type of foreign food? I enjoy Italian food.
   59. Are you a clean or messy person? 50/50
   61. How long does it take you to get ready in the morning? 20 minutes/30 minutes on bad days.
   62. What kitchen appliance do you use every day? The kettle.

replies.body:
@rese
I think that you are the only good mod that is still around. You were the only person back then that acted cool when everything went to shit so ur nice like that. Nowadays, looking at the mods I think you are what remains of the past. Hope you stay on Avicus. Also a nice guy to talk too, from the few times we have.

opinions the first time i met you?: The first time I met you was when you had just been accepted as junior. I won't lie as you probably know this now. I thought you were of the other gender. Which confused me when people told me you were a guy. Regardless, I remember the enthusiasm that you had and it was interesting seeing someone as excited as when I was when I got promoted.
opinions now?: Way more mature, you turned into one of my good friends. When everyone is was leaving you stayed and we developed our relationship with Peachy and Ethan. It was so much fun ranting with you. I still hope you took all the advice I gave you.

opinions on new junior?: They are all very interesting individuals with strange personas. Although, I will concede that a few of them are gonna be good (based on the past).
opinions on the current mods?: All the mods are pretty bad, although the old ones are great. Excluding two.
opinions on the new seniors?: I do not know who Passively is. Kyoal knows how I feel about him, I struggle to grasp how Camemes is a senior. Crazy_ actually has a brain, but I never got to talk with him.

do all the seniors and admins deserve their spot? who doesnt?: No obviously not.  I think that fourout of the six active senior staff don't deserve their spot. I think that you know who I dont agree with.

redo the whole staff team with people you think would be good: Senior Staff: Dream Team.(The Iron Reign) Mods: You and the mods when I was manager.
